name: Kaolin
description:
Visit a small and mysterious island. By day or by night, relax yourself by taking a walk in Kaolin. 

Controls: Arrows and mouse. 

Credits: 

Graphics/Programming: Ghjuvannu-Carlu Sozzi

Sound Design/Composition: Maxime Touchon

Special thanks:  Yannig Leguern // Lucas Terryn for his great help on shaders and Fx
